p:
Functional Analysis using Cytoscape ClueGO App
57– 59 was performed on the overlapping differentially expressed genes by peripheral blood mononuclear cells from chemotherapy-treated (GSE39324)
36 and COVID-19
35 datasets. 135 upregulated and 112 genes downregulated were uploaded separately to ClueGO. The software uses Kappa statistics to link terms within a network, two-sided hypergeometric tests were used to define enrichment, the Bonferroni step down p value correction method was also implemented with a q-value threshold of ≤ 0.05.
